about_the_game:
Chronocracy is an exciting real-time strategy game where you'll lead a small civilization, developing its society and surviving on a whimsical flat earth disk.

Lead your tribe, wisely allocate forces and resources to fend off neighboring attacks, uncover secrets hidden in time, and save your civilization from destruction. 

  • Explore both the surface and underground depths, build mines, and gather rare resources.

  • Develop your cities and master the planet.

  • Harness technologies ranging from agriculture to advanced scientific achievements.

  • Discover new tools for efficient management of resources and settlements.

  • Assemble a powerful army, from squads of archers and spearmen to modern helicopters and megatitans! 

  • Form diplomatic alliances with other peoples.

  • Travel through time to rewrite the destiny of your tribe.

Add Chronocracy to your wishlist, subscribe for news, and learn more about the world awaiting your reign!

Evolve

Lead one of four tribes and bring it to greatness by building a network of prosperous cities and exploring the entire planet! Start with a town hall and a handful of loyal followers, and create a highly developed civilization ready to face not only fluffy plump birds but also fearsome invaders.

Hire scholars and research the sciences to unlock new technologies and buildings. More than 15 unique buildings await you, each bringing your civilization closer to planetary greatness.

Develop basic infrastructure: build housing, ensure food and resource production. Create economic buildings for trade, extraction of rare materials, and production of unique resources. Build powerful military structures to defend your lands and arm your people, from bows and spears to firearms and cavalry of plump bird riders.

Survive

The flat world of Chronocracy may seem peaceful and cozy, but behind its charming facade lie threats that could destroy your civilization. You will encounter multiple enemies, from treacherous local fauna, including plump birds and larvae, to unfriendly neighbors and mysterious dark guests from afar.


To survive, organize efficient resource extraction and production, maintain a balance between combat and peaceful units, uncover the secrets of mysterious foes, and eliminate threats before they become irreversible. Can you protect your civilization and turn it into a powerful force capable of conquering this strange world?

Extract

Resource extraction and production are key to the survival and development of your civilization. There are more than 20 different types of resources that will provide everything you need to thrive.

Some resources will need to be mined on the surface or deep in the earth, while others can only be created through scientific discovery and advanced technology.

Once you master time management, you will gain access to a unique resource—Metamaterial—which will become the basis for creating powerful Titans and defense against formidable invaders.

Become a master of resource management and use it to turn your civilization into an invincible force. Forward to great achievements!
